summary: The module provides a runnable example that builds, trains, and evaluates a Relational Graph Convolutional Network (RGCN) for entity classification on several RDF benchmark datasets using DGL and PyTorch.
business_intent: Illustrate how to apply graph neural networks to relational knowledgeâ€‘graph data, serving as a reference implementation for developers and researchers building entity classification models on RDF or similar graph structures.
